casebody.data:
[Cite as 12/27/2002 Case Announcements #2, 2002-0hio-7218.]

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS AND ADMINISTRATIVE ACTIONS

December 27, 2002

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2002-0803 and 2002-0837. German v. Therm-O-Disc, Inc.

Richland App. No. 01CA512, 2002-0hio-1848. Sua sponte, cause held for the decision in 2002-0579, Burkhart v. CNA Ins. Co., Stark App. No. 2001CA00265, 2002-Ohio-903; briefing schedule stayed.

Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., dissent and would schedule this cause for argument on the same date as in 2002-0579.
